room_title: Escape room "Gone" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: My group and I did Gone on 3/15/18 and it was BEYOND FUN. We beat it and had a blast running around and figuring out the clues — the hints helped, but it was our first time there. I can’t wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Gone" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Great time at Exit Strategy South with my PD sisters. It was sooo fun, we did Gone! Definitely had us on our toes the whole time. Thanks McKenzie, you were an awesome host!

room_title: Escape room "Gone" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We had a great time! The “Gone” room is so fun and creepy, very challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Gone" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Visiting from Tampa and being obsessed with escape rooms we HAD to give it a try! Gone was AMAZING! The props and the theming were INSANE! If you enjoy scary movies and being scared this room is SO worth it. We all felt like we were in a scary movie. The props were great, the puzzles definitely made you think, it truly was difficult in the best way. We will definitely be back next time we’re in Charlotte!

room_title: Escape room "Gone" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Lauren was an amazing Master for my friend and I who did Gone last night! The room was definitely a major challenge for two people, but Lauren was there the entire time. She also talked to us a bit and encouraged us to not be scared of some of the creepy things in the room. It definitely created a very enjoyable experience and she was super awesome! We will definitely be back!
